---
title: "📣 Help us introduce Ophel to the world! / 呼吁大家帮忙宣传 Ophel！"
labels: ["help wanted", "good first issue", "discussion"]
---

### English

**Hello community! 👋**

We've been working hard to make **Ophel** the best AI assistant for Gemini, ChatGPT, Claude, and more. We believe Ophel can significantly improve people's productivity and reading experience.

However, building a great tool is only half the battle. We need YOUR help to let the world know about it! 🌍

**How you can help:**

1. **Share on Social Media**: Tweet about Ophel on **X (Twitter)**, share it on **Reddit** (e.g., r/ChromeExtensions, r/ArtificialInteligence, r/OpenAI), or post on **Hacker News**.
2. **Product Hunt**: If you haven't already, please support our upcoming launch on Product Hunt! (Link TBD)
3. **Blog & Video**: Write a blog post or make a short video review on YouTube/TikTok.
4. **Connect with Influencers**: If you know any **tech KOLs, YouTubers, or bloggers** (especially in the English-speaking world) who review AI tools or browser extensions, please recommend Ophel to them! Mentioning them in this thread or tagging them on social media would be amazing.

**If you have shared Ophel somewhere, please let us know in the comments below so we can thank you! 🙏**

> "If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together."
>
> If you like Ophel, please give us a **Star 🌟** on GitHub! It means a lot to us.

Let's make Ophel accessible to everyone who needs it. Thank you for your support! 💖

---

### 中文

**大家好！👋**

**Ophel** 希望为用户提供极致的 AI 交互体验。不论是智能大纲、会话管理还是阅读优化，我们都倾注了大量心血。

好酒也怕巷子深。作为一个开源项目，我们需要大家的帮助来让更多人知道 Ophel！

**您可以如何帮助我们：**

1. **社交媒体传播**：在 **Twitter/X**、**即刻**、**微博** 或 **朋友圈** 分享 Ophel。
2. **社区推荐**：在 **Reddit**、**V2EX**、**掘金** 等技术社区推荐 Ophel。
3. **大 V 推荐**：如果您认识海外科技圈的 **KOL、博主或 YouTuber**，请向他们安利 Ophel！特别是英语世界的影响力者，能帮助我们打开国际市场。
4. **内容创作**：写一篇评测文章或制作一个短视频。

**如果您在任何地方分享了 Ophel，请在下方评论区告诉我们，让我们有机会向您致谢！🙏**

> "一个人可以走得很快，但一群人可以走得更远。"
>
> 如果你喜欢 Ophel，请在 GitHub 上为我们点个 **Star 🌟**！这对我们非常重要。

感谢每一位开发者的支持，让我们一起走得更远！ 🚀
